title: BBC World Service - World Business Report, Tis' the season to be spending on advertisements
text: Every year, companies churn out new TV adverts that they hope will draw people in to their shops to buy gifts for everyone on their Christmas list. It is boom time for advertising agencies, with huge sums of money spent on these ads. The BBC's Victoria Craig has been finding out how much it costs to spread the commercial holiday cheer.
